questions.quote: Elaine, that's what mail is. Without bills, magazines and junk mail, there is no mail.
I'm talking about the pig man. I went into the wrong room and there he was.
Oh, don't be ridiculous! Is that what you wanted to talk to me about? [Gives him the $35] Here.
Yeah.  I'll get it, I'll get it! Take it easy, why are you so tired?
Hey did you notice they moved where they do the interview on Jeopardy now?
I know exactly what's gonna happen tonight. I'm gonna try and act like I'm not impressed, he's gonna see right through it.
Elaine? Guess what. I've decided to Form a Charitable Foundation, in Susie's honor. And as Susie's best friend, I want you to be involved.
Yes, in fact she told me that she wishes she was the one getting married.
Well, do you want to go out for a walk, get a cup of coffee...
Shoes? Shoes?! Shoes?! Shoes weren't invented till the fourth century! People walked around for thousands of years without them!  I got this. Let's go!
